Entries.Indoor_Night_3: Oh, @, let me give you a foot rub tonight.#$b#You must be tired, working all day outside...

Entries.winter_Thu10: Emily made me a lovely sweater last year...I should do something nice for her this Feast of Winter Star...
Entries.6_2: My practice is barely scraping by. Not sure how I can see more patients in a town as small as this, though.$s
Entries.7_2: Sorry if I'm grumpy, I was up all night entering data into the electronic medical record.$s#$b#Say, @, would you happen to have a spare coffee?
Entries.9_2: Stay safe out there, @. Don't get hurt too often.
Entries.22_2: Saw a new study from %place Biologics, their new chemotherapy agent doubled the five-year survival rate for non-alcoholic primary hepatic malignancy.
Entries.26_2: I don't eat as well as I should. Often I don't have enough time or energy after a long workday to do anything but toss a frozen meal into the microwave.#$b#And then there's all the charting I still need to do.
Entries.28_2: One of the difficult things of practicing medicine in a small town is the lack of equipment.#$b#We've got an x-ray machine and an ultrasound. That's it.#$e#Sometimes I worry I provide substandard care because I can't get access to a CT machine.$s

Entries.6_2: I got into medicine because I wanted to help people. But these days I feel like I'm doing more paperwork than anything else...$s
Entries.8_2: Between you and I, I get nightmares sometimes.#$b#I'm always terrified that someone here might have an emergency beyond my abilities to treat.#$b#We're so far from the nearest hospital.
Entries.9_2: I also take care of everyone's teeth. This town isn't large enough to have both a dentist and a doctor.#$b#Say, how good are your teeth?$h
Entries.10_2: The last doc who was here....well, he was a company doc. Worked for the mines, took care of the miners.#$b#Frankly, @, I'm glad I'm not on anyone's payroll anymore.
Entries.11_2: I came out here because I wanted a slower pace of life.#$b#In the city, the money-men lean on us to see so many patients in a day, it's hard to connect with anyone.#$e#Of course, I wouldn't be able to afford the move if the government didn't have programs to help me with medical school debt.#$e#Sometimes, still, I feel like the clinic is barely hanging on, financially.
Entries.13_2: I really should get a new coffee maker...my current one seems to be on the brink of breaking...$s

Entries.12_2: You know, if %pet gets sick, I could probably take care of them too!

Entries.Harvey: #$c .9#A cup of coffee would be quite nice right now.#Here. Have a cup of coffee. It's important to stay warm on a day like this.[395]
